mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.number AS "number", a.name AS "name", a.xingbie AS "xingbie", a.bumen AS "bumen", a.erji_bumen AS "erjiBumen", a.gangwei AS "gangwei", a.jishu_leibie AS "jishuLeibie", a.cengji_leibie AS "cengjiLeibie", a.yuangong_type AS "yuangongType", a.ruzhi_date AS "ruzhiDate", a.hetong_type AS "hetongType", a.hetong_time AS "hetongTime", a.hetong_number AS "hetongNumber", a.shiyongqi_time AS "shiyongqiTime", a.shiyongqi_date AS "shiyongqiDate", a.hetong_leixing AS "hetongLeixing", a.zhuanzheng_date AS "zhuanzhengDate", a.shenfenzheng AS "shenfenzheng", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.canjiagongzuo_date AS "canjiagongzuoDate", a.jiguan AS "jiguan", a.minzu AS "minzu", a.zhengzhi_mianmao AS "zhengzhiMianmao", a.hunyin_zhuangkuang AS "hunyinZhuangkuang", a.huji_xingzhi AS "hujiXingzhi", a.diyi_xueli AS "diyiXueli", a.diyi_zhuanye AS "diyiZhuanye", a.diyi_yuanxiao AS "diyiYuanxiao", a.shifou_tongzhao AS "shifouTongzhao", a.zuigao_xueli AS "zuigaoXueli", a.zhuanye AS "zhuanye", a.biye_yuanxiao AS "biyeYuanxiao", a.telephone AS "telephone", a.xianzhuzhi AS "xianzhuzhi", a.jinji_lianxiren AS "jinjiLianxiren", a.jinji_telephone AS "jinjiTelephone", a.yuangongzuodanwei AS "yuangongzuodanwei", a.shifou_lizhi AS "shifouLizhi", a.lizhi_leixing AS "lizhiLeixing"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_user( id, create_date, update_date, del_flag, number, name, xingbie, bumen, erji_bumen, gangwei, jishu_leibie, cengji_leibie, yuangong_type, ruzhi_date, hetong_type, hetong_time, hetong_number, shiyongqi_time, shiyongqi_date, hetong_leixing, zhuanzheng_date, shenfenzheng, birthday, canjiagongzuo_date, jiguan, minzu, zhengzhi_mianmao, hunyin_zhuangkuang, huji_xingzhi, diyi_xueli, diyi_zhuanye, diyi_yuanxiao, shifou_tongzhao, zuigao_xueli, zhuanye, biye_yuanxiao, telephone, xianzhuzhi, jinji_lianxiren, jinji_telephone, yuangongzuodanwei, shifou_lizhi, lizhi_leixing ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{number}, #{name}, #{xingbie}, #{bumen}, #{erjiBumen}, #{gangwei}, #{jishuLeibie}, #{cengjiLeibie}, #{yuangongType}, #{ruzhiDate}, #{hetongType}, #{hetongTime}, #{hetongNumber}, #{shiyongqiTime}, #{shiyongqiDate}, #{hetongLeixing}, #{zhuanzhengDate}, #{shenfenzheng}, #{birthday}, #{canjiagongzuoDate}, #{jiguan}, #{minzu}, #{zhengzhiMianmao}, #{hunyinZhuangkuang}, #{hujiXingzhi}, #{diyiXueli}, #{diyiZhuanye}, #{diyiYuanxiao}, #{shifouTongzhao}, #{zuigaoXueli}, #{zhuanye}, #{biyeYuanxiao}, #{telephone}, #{xianzhuzhi}, #{jinjiLianxiren}, #{jinjiTelephone}, #{yuangongzuodanwei}, #{shifouLizhi}, #{lizhiLeixing} )
mapper.update: UPDATE check_user SET update_date = #{updateDate}, number = #{number}, name = #{name}, xingbie = #{xingbie}, bumen = #{bumen}, erji_bumen = #{erjiBumen}, gangwei = #{gangwei}, jishu_leibie = #{jishuLeibie}, cengji_leibie = #{cengjiLeibie}, yuangong_type = #{yuangongType}, ruzhi_date = #{ruzhiDate}, hetong_type = #{hetongType}, hetong_time = #{hetongTime}, hetong_number = #{hetongNumber}, shiyongqi_time = #{shiyongqiTime}, shiyongqi_date = #{shiyongqiDate}, hetong_leixing = #{hetongLeixing}, zhuanzheng_date = #{zhuanzhengDate}, shenfenzheng = #{shenfenzheng}, birthday = #{birthday}, canjiagongzuo_date = #{canjiagongzuoDate}, jiguan = #{jiguan}, minzu = #{minzu}, zhengzhi_mianmao = #{zhengzhiMianmao}, hunyin_zhuangkuang = #{hunyinZhuangkuang}, huji_xingzhi = #{hujiXingzhi}, diyi_xueli = #{diyiXueli}, diyi_zhuanye = #{diyiZhuanye}, diyi_yuanxiao = #{diyiYuanxiao}, shifou_tongzhao = #{shifouTongzhao}, zuigao_xueli = #{zuigaoXueli}, zhuanye = #{zhuanye}, biye_yuanxiao = #{biyeYuanxiao}, telephone = #{telephone}, xianzhuzhi = #{xianzhuzhi}, jinji_lianxiren = #{jinjiLianxiren}, jinji_telephone = #{jinjiTelephone}, yuangongzuodanwei = #{yuangongzuodanwei}, shifou_lizhi = #{shifouLizhi}, lizhi_leixing = #{lizhiLeixing} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from check_user where del_flag = 0
and LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{nameLike},'%'))
order by cast(number as UNSIGNED INTEGER)
limit #{total},#{count}
